entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:28 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
